targets.expr: sum by(otel_scope_name) (p2p_server_peers{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name"})
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (p2p_server_peers_canal{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"})
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (p2p_server_canal_jobs{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"})

panels.description: Net peer change over the rate interval

targets.expr: sum by(otel_scope_name) (delta(p2p_server_peers{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Peer delta

targets.expr: sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, result, reason) (p2p_server_connect_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", result=~"$connect_result", reason=~"$connect_reason"})
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum(rate(p2p_server_connect_latency_seconds_bucket{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, otel_scope_name, canal))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(p2p_server_connect_latency_seconds_bucket{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, otel_scope_name, canal))

100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_connect_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", result="ok", reason=~"$connect_reason"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_connect_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", result=~"ok|error", reason=~"$connect_reason"}[$__rate_interval]))

topk($topk, sum by(peer, canal, reason, otel_scope_name) (rate(p2p_server_connect_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", result="error", reason=~"$connect_reason"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, reason) (rate(p2p_server_reconnect_attempt_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", reason=~"$reconnect_reason"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_reconnect_attempt_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", reason=~"$reconnect_reason"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (p2p_server_peers_canal{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}), 1)

sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, reason) (rate(p2p_server_connect_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", result="error", reason=~"$connect_reason"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, phase) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", phase=~"$handshake_phase"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", phase=~"$handshake_phase"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.5, sum by(le, otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_latency_seconds_bucket{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval])))
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(p2p_server_handshake_latency_seconds_bucket{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, otel_scope_name, canal))

panels.description: Average handshake latency across the selected range (stable even with sparse handshakes)

targets.expr: sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (increase(p2p_server_handshake_latency_seconds_sum{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__range])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (increase(p2p_server_handshake_latency_seconds_count{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__range])), 1)

panels.title: Handshake latency avg (range)

targets.expr: 100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_error_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", phase=~"$handshake_phase", reason=~"$handshake_reason"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", phase=~"$handshake_phase"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)

100 - (100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, phase) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_error_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", phase=~"$handshake_phase", reason=~"$handshake_reason"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, phase) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", phase=~"$handshake_phase"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9))

topk($topk, sum by(peer, canal, reason, phase, otel_scope_name) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_error_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", phase=~"$handshake_phase", reason=~"$handshake_reason"}[$__rate_interval])))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, phase) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_throttle_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", phase=~"$handshake_phase"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, phase, reason) (rate(p2p_server_handshake_error_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer", phase=~"$handshake_phase", reason=~"$handshake_reason"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_rehandshake_error_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", peer=~"$peer"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{direction="tx", result=~"$message_result", otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction, result) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", result=~"$message_result"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Message error ratio across selected direction

targets.expr: 100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", result="error"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)

panels.title: Message error rate

panels.description: Tx message error ratio by canal

targets.expr: 100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction="tx", result="error"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction="tx", result=~"ok|error|closed"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)

panels.title: Tx message error ratio

targets.expr: 100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", result="closed"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", result=~"ok|error|closed"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_broadcast_targets_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_broadcast_failures_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval]))

100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_broadcast_failures_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_broadcast_targets_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, type) (rate(p2p_server_tcp_event_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", type=~"$tcp_type"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_ping_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal="$canal"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction, reason) (rate(p2p_server_unknown_peer_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", reason=~"$unknown_reason"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.description: Unknown peer ratio vs all messages

targets.expr: 100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction) (rate(p2p_server_unknown_peer_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", reason=~"$unknown_reason"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, direction) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", result=~"ok|error|closed"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)

panels.title: Unknown peer rate

targets.expr: sum by(otel_scope_name, canal, action) (rate(p2p_server_poison_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", action=~"$action", peer=~"$peer"}[$__rate_interval]))
topk($topk, sum by(peer, canal, action, otel_scope_name) (rate(p2p_server_poison_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", action=~"$action", peer=~"$peer"}[$__rate_interval])))

100 * sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_poison_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", action=~"$action", peer=~"$peer"}[$__rate_interval])) / clamp_min(sum by(otel_scope_name, canal) (rate(p2p_server_message_total{otel_scope_name=~"$otel_scope_name", canal=~"$canal", direction=~"$direction", result=~"$message_result"}[$__rate_interval])), 1e-9)
